title: Maruti Suzuki rejigs senior management; Tarun Aggarwal to succeed C V Raman
description: Maruti Suzuki has announced organizational changes in its engineering, marketing, sales, supply chain, and human resources departments. Starting April 1, Tarun Aggarwal will replace C V Raman as Engineering Head, Partho Banerjee will replace Shashank Srivastava as Marketing & Sales Head, Manoj Gautam will replace Rajesh Uppal as Information Technology Head, and Deepak Thukral will replace Sunil Kakkar as Supply Chain Head.
